lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are a wizard on your way through the magic forest.
Along your path you have n encounters, which can either be a FRIEND or a FOE.

You can cast different kind spells , that HEAL your allies or ATTACK your opponents.

To maximizes the result of your spell, you must match it to the opponents type.

The types are: FIRE, WATER, EARTH

To HEAL, you must match the type.
To ATTACK, you must use the type, that does maximum damage, as following:
FIRE : Choose WATER
WATER : Choose EARTH
EARTH : Choose FIRE

For every encounter output one line, containing the kind of the spell and the type
Input
Line 1: An integer n for the number of encounters
Next n lines: Two space separated strings opponent and type
Output
n lines: Containing the kind and the type of the spell, separated by space
Constraints
1 <= n <= 10
Example
Input
3
FRIEND EARTH
FRIEND WATER
FRIEND FIRE
Output
HEAL EARTH
HEAL WATER
HEAL FIRE
